#summary A general introduction to taggging data

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= For new users of electronic tagging ... =

= Popular platforms =

  * GPS or Argos satellite radio-linked telemetry tags (SRLT)
  * Archival tags
  * Popup satellite archival tags (PSAT or PAT)
  * Acoustic tags
